-- | Multiple Instance for Haskell
--   
--   Library for Multiple Instance
@package mi
@version 0.0.1

module Language.MI.TH
dicTable :: IORef [([Char], [[Char]])]
mi :: QuasiQuoter
pMultipleInstance :: Parser (String, String, String)
pDicName :: ParsecT String u Identity [Char]
pTypeClassName :: ParsecT String u Identity [Char]
pDataTypeName :: ParsecT String u Identity [Char]
pFuncDef :: ParsecT String u Identity [Char]
pFunc :: Parser String
appendUnderbar :: String -> String
sub :: String -> Parser String
replaceMatchAll :: ParsecT [Char] () Identity [Char] -> [Char] -> [Char]
multipleInstance :: String -> Q [Dec]
miClass :: Monad m => Cxt -> Name -> [TyVarBndr] -> [Dec] -> m [Dec]
miInstance :: [Char] -> String -> [Char] -> Q [Dec]
miFunc :: [Char] -> String -> Q [Dec]
